record.id: field.name="print.master.hdr" and file.name="report" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: print.master.hdr
record.file.name: report

brief.brief: Determines whether to print the default master header along with any user-defined headers at the top of every page.

detail.detail: Yes: Report Writer prints one of two forms (report.master.hdr132 or report.master.hdr80, depending on the value specified in the Width field) at the top of every page.
The formats report.master.hdr132 and reportlmaster.hdr80 print the following information:
- Company title as defined in the System Wide Company Record in the info file.
- Operator ID of operator who generated report.
- Selection criteria (if query is true, then it is reported as all records, otherwise the actual query is printed).

No: Report Writer only prints the form specified in the Header Format Name field at the top of every page. If the field Header Format Name is blank, Report Writer only prints the form specified in the Detail Format Name field.
You can incorporate the fields normally printed on a master header in the user-defined header form.
To set the width of a report, complete the Page Width field of the Client Printing structure in the user's Operator record. For more details on completing the Operator record, see the online help.
